scripts.build: if test "$OSTYPE" '==' 'linux-gnu'; then npm run build-locale; fi; set -e; for pkg in hash utils schema protocol db functions errors schema-diagram server client react s3 hub type-gen cli exporter sdk; do npm run build -w "@based/$pkg"; done
scripts.test: npm run test --workspaces --if-present; exit_code=$?; exit_code=$?; [ $exit_code -eq 0 ] && echo "All tests passed" || echo "Some test in the workspace fails with error code $exit_code"
scripts.build-release-debug: npm run reset; npm run build-podman && npm run build-locale release && npm run build && (cd packages/db && npm run build-release-debug)
scripts.build-release: npm run reset; npm run build-podman && npm run build-locale release && npm run build && (cd packages/db && npm run build-release)
scripts.check: for i in packages/*; do npx npm-check-updates -f @based/* -x @based/client-old --cwd $i; done
scripts.upgrade: for i in packages/*; do npx npm-check-updates -f @based/* -x @based/client-old --cwd $i -u; done
